data.title: Family-style, great service
data.text: Fantastic service, food was above average, but not over the top. The location in town is a delight, easy parking. The Greek salad dressing was amazing, and when I go back, I'll likely just get a salad....and more rice pudding.

data.title: All food is homemade and fresh!
data.text: When in Dearborn, this restaurant is a must. All food is homemade and fresh. They don't have a freezer. Original recipes. The husband and wife team make everything! Daily specials add some variety to the menu. When they are out, they're out. I have never been disappointed. The food is so good, I don't have the words. Fast and friendly service too.

data.title: Excellent Food and Service!
data.text: M&M Café has been an east Dearborn favorite of mine for decades! Everything I have tried there has been exceptional, but I have to confess that the Café Lemon Chicken is probably my favorite dish anywhere-I rarely order anything else because it is so good!

data.title: Good Food and Good Service
data.text: I went here based on the TripAdvisor rating.  It was good, tasty, not great or out of this world.  I had a nice salad and something like a hamburger kabob.  They were both good and were made with quality.  I would go back, but not racing back.  Service was good and the location was good.  Park in the back.

data.title: Great food from scratch.
data.text: If you're looking for great food made from scratch, M&M Cafe fits the bill.  Elaine and Maurice prepare meals with fresh ingredients.  Once the specials are gone, they're gone for the night.  No frozen or microwave food here.  The white fish special is our favorite, so order ahead on that day.  This cafe is a favorite for locals at lunch and dinner for those in the know.  Nothing disappoints.

data.title: Go on Monday ..
data.text: Don't miss the salmon and carrot cake on Mondays.  Owners and all involved in the dining experience are fabulous.

data.title: Dearborn's Hidden Jewel
data.text:
My husband Jim and I have been going to M & M's for many years.  The food is always fresh and mouthwatering.  Elaine and Maurice are the perfect hosts and always greet you by name as if you are family.  I too wish they were open on weekends!  We are lucky to live so close to this hidden jewel. 

Marlene Wojtowicz

data.title: M&M is always my first choice. The owners and staff strive for excellence in service, quality and presentation!
data.text:
Your visit to M&M Café will feed your body and spirit, starting with a friendly greeting followed by an array of daily specials and constantly satisfying menu choices.
The daily soups are not to be missed.  You might just be there on a day that Elaine bakes a scrumptious dessert.

data.title: Food
data.text: The food is great as well as the service. We had the lemon chicken and rice chicken was moist and flavor was off the chart

data.title: Great Mediterranean food, reasonably price and excellent service. A mom and pop restaurant with 5-Star Food.
data.text: We've been meaning to eat here for years....we don't live in Michigan, so going to M & M required work.  We were in Dearborn for three weeks and finally got to eat at M & M Cafe.  Wow - we have been missing out for years.  The food is superb.  The menu is not extensive. Check out the daily specials.  Soup is incredible. My husband's favorite was the bean, mine was potato.  The chicken is incredible . Anything that includes vegetables is great. Don't know what they do to make the veggies, but they are perfect. The dressing on the salad is incredible. This is not the restaurant to go to if you want Ranch dressing. They only have one kind of dressing...no sugar or salt added. It is perfect.  And before you leave, get rice pudding.  We went there three times in three weeks, each time taking rice pudding home with us to eat later.  Warning - opened 11 to 7 Monday through Friday.  They only take cash.  But the meals are so reasonable, cash is no big issue. And no liquor.   Elaine (the owner, along with her husband Maurice) is very nice. Nothing seem to faze her.  This is our new  go-to for great food in Dearborn.

data.title: Good food, lots of it
data.text: We ate the famous lemon chicken, recommended by other Trip Advisor reviewers.  The chicken is excellent, the portion was enormous, the price was very inexpensive.  If you are looking for a good home-cooked meal, this is it.  The cafe is very popular with the locals.  It has convenient parking.

data.title: Yummy fresh Mediterranean, but bring cash!
data.text: This is a cash-only establishment, good thing I was with someone who had some... food was very fresh & delicious, three of us shared a large greek and an order of hummus and we each had sandwiches, the kafta and the chicken kabob. Chicken kabob was juicy and wrapped with yogurt sauce and veggies. Get the kafta with hummus and a side of cucumber yogurt/sour cream. Hummus was delicious. They have fresh brewed iced tea, always a plus. Then we topped it all off with very tasty rice pudding with cinnamon, which was more rice than pudding, as it should be. A great lunch place if you are going to spend the afternoon at The Henry Ford or Greenfield Village, which are very nearby.

data.title: Best food in Dearborn
data.text: Over the almost 30 years since we've been going to M & M Cafe, a lot has changed: location, menu, etc. But what hasn't changed are the wonderful people who run the restaurant and the delicious food! Just thinking about the Cafe Lemon Chicken and the lentil soup - oh man, my mouth is watering! Just the ideal local restaurant with amazing food and friendly faces. I wish we still lived close so that we could eat there daily!

data.title: Great Cafe/ Mid-East Food
data.text: I really like this place. Near home, friendly owners/staff, and great food. I only wish they were open later and on weekends. The Cafe Lemon Chicken is Mo's signature dish and it is awesome!

data.title: Resturant
data.text: The M&M Cafe on 13714 Michigan Ave in Dearborn is one of Dearborns hidden jewels...Elaine and her husband Maurice has owned and managed their busy Cafe for more then 40 years...And it has just got better every year...Their fresh clean food that is prepared per order is spot on!..The freshly made hummus is the best around..You must order that..The greek salad has the freshes lettuce,tomatoes,Fetta cheese..and everything else that goes on there..From the Chicken Sandwich to the Homemade lemon lentil soup or any of the others... You will enjoy the atmosphere the hot dinners..the simplicity and cleanliness of everything in this Cafe..Great place to eat..Highly recommended...

data.title: What an unbelievably pleasant surprise and visit I had on Monday.  The food was so fresh and tasty.
data.text: I came with 9 of my work colleagues.  Everyone had glowing reviews of their grilled chicken sandwiches and assortments of wrapped sandwich or the lemon chicken favorite entree.  I had the grilled salmon special with rice and vegetables with a side house salad, even the salad dressing was nice, though could have used a bit more vinegar on it, was heavier on the oil.  My salmon was fresh and didn't smell fishy, was fresh and perfectly cooked.  It feels like eating a great warm and fresh meal at home.

data.title: Excellent
data.text: Loved the food.   Vegetarian or omnivore, you will find fresh, tastey healthy offerings.  Clean and comfortable.  Bring cash,  but there are ATMs close by.

data.title: Excellent home cooked meals!
data.text: This is my 2nd time to M & M Cafe. The food is fresh & homemade with daily specials and soup. The service is good & friendly. Reminds me of a little diner. You can go here with business clients (No alcohol), family or friends for a filling, delicious meal. Very reasonalbly priced also.

data.title: Happy, 20 year patron!
data.text: This is one of the best little jewels in the city of Dearborn. All food is prepared for the day, by the hardworking owners, using only fresh vegetables, meat, fish. There is a "special" menu for each day, with homemade soup, plus their regular menu. The fresh made salads come already dressed with simple oil and vinegar.The owners are the only ones who who prepare the food. I have been going there, for the last 20 years. It is a comfortable, clean, nicely decorated space with lots of booths down one side and tables near the front. It is not a "greasy spoon" type place. They are not open on the week end and close at 7:00 during the week. Their patrons include many who dine/lunch there on a regular basis. One gentleman that I know of, has dined there for the 20 years that I have known of M&M. No alcohol, ample parking in the back, cash only. Reserve some room for Elaine's wonderful yummy lemon rice pudding, (or take a cup home for later). You won't be sorry!

data.title: Reliably fresh food and delicious local's cafe!
data.text: Primarily a busy lunch cafe, every item is fresh and delicious.  I go often because I can rely on it and I especially love the lemon chicken and the soups.
